metadata.title: Enhanced MCP Declaration for wellknownmcp.org
metadata.description: This site offers verified MCP tools, feeds, and contribution endpoints with universal feed loading capabilities. Now featuring HTML-embedded JSON format for maximum LLM tool compatibility. The HTML API validates LLMFeed structure to maintain ecosystem quality.

data.name: HTML-Embedded JSON Format with LLMFeed Validation
data.description: Revolutionary approach to serve validated LLMFeed files wrapped in LLM-friendly HTML for maximum tool compatibility and ecosystem integrity
benefits: Resolves LLM web tool navigation failures
Includes semantic metadata and SEO optimization
Maintains JSON accessibility with enhanced presentation
Ensures only valid LLMFeed content is served
Provides helpful validation errors for invalid feeds
data.target_problem: ChatGPT, Claude and other LLM web tools often fail with raw JSON endpoints, and generic JSON-to-HTML APIs could be misused for non-LLMFeed content
data.solution: Serve only validated LLMFeeds as semantic HTML with embedded JSON, SEO metadata, human-readable formatting, and strict validation with helpful error messages
validation_features: Feed type validation against known standards
Helpful error pages with fix suggestions
Prevents API misuse for generic JSON content
